channel.title: MotorPurgeSystems on SangMyung
channel.description: Recent content in MotorPurgeSystems on SangMyung

item.title: D758 Motor Purge & Pressurization System
item.description: IECEx, ATEX & INMETRO Certified Purge and Pressurization System for large Electrical Machines. Features Global approvals Purge flow capacity up to 6,000 Nl/min Stable machine pressure with CLAPS technology Stainless steel enclosure construction. Temperature range -20°C to +55°C Description The D758 purge and pressurization system delivers purge flowrates up to 6,000 Nl/min and is ideal for medium to large sized Ex p electrical machines.

item.title: Low Temperature Motor Purge & Pressurization Systems
item.description: IECEx, ATEX & INMETRO Certified Purge and Pressurization Systems for Electrical Machines in Very Low Temperature Environments Features Certification to -60°C Purge flow capacity between 1,000 and 14,000 Nl/min Stable machine pressure with CLAPS technology Stainless steel enclosure construction Description Building on the range of motor purge and pressurization systems for standard temperature, Expo have developed special systems for low temperature service as low as -60oC ambient.

item.title: Motor Pre-Start Ventilation Systems (3PV, 5PV, 7PV)
item.description: IECEx & ATEX certified pre-start ventilation systems for large Ex e & Ex n electrical machines Features Certification to +60°C Pre-start ventilation flow capacity up to 14,000 Nl/min Remote start options Stainless steel enclosure construction Description Expo’s PV range of pre-start ventilation systems provide essential protection to large non-sparking electric motors. The PV range can deliver pre-start ventilation flow rates of up to 14,000 Nl/min and is ideal for very large sized Ex e and Ex n electrical machines.
